name: identifier
label: Identifier
description: A unique proper name or character sequence that identifies this particular genomic variant observation. (NCIT:C93939 )

name: belongstogenomicvariantdescription
label: Belongs to genomic variant description
description: Belongs to genomic variant description (SIO:000628, NCIT:C17248 )

name: allele1
label: Allele 1
description: One of a set of sequence features known to exist at a particular genomic location. (GENO:0000512 )

name: allele2
label: Allele 2
description: One of a set of sequence features known to exist at a particular genomic location. (GENO:0000512 )

name: zygosity
label: Zygosity
description: The genetic condition of a zygote, especially with respect to its being a homozygote or a heterozygote. (NCIT:C45824, GENO:0000133 )

name: maternalallele1
label: Maternal allele 1
description: One of a set of sequence features known to exist at a particular genomic location. (GENO:0000878, GENO:0000512 )

name: maternalallele2
label: Maternal allele 2
description: One of a set of sequence features known to exist at a particular genomic location. (GENO:0000878, GENO:0000512 )

name: motherreaddepth
label: Mother Read Depth
description: Read depth of maternal allele (GENO:0000878, NCIT:C155320 )

name: motherallelefrequencyallele1
label: Mother Allele Frequency Allele 1
description: Frequency of maternal allele 1 (not the population allele frequency, but the ratio between allele 1 and 2) (GENO:0000878, NCIT:C173545 )

name: motherallelefrequencyallele2
label: Mother Allele Frequency Allele 2
description: Frequency of maternal allele 2 (not the population allele frequency, but the ratio between allele 1 and 2) (GENO:0000878, NCIT:C173545 )

name: motherallelicdepthallele1
label: Mother Allelic Depth Allele 1
description: Mother Allelic Depth Allele 1 (GENO:0000878, NCIT:C155320 )

name: motherallelicdepthallele2
label: Mother Allelic Depth Allele 2
description: Mother Allelic Depth Allele 2 (GENO:0000878, NCIT:C155320 )

name: paternalallele1
label: Paternal allele 1
description: One of a set of sequence features known to exist at a particular genomic location. (GENO:0000879, GENO:0000512 )

name: paternalallele2
label: Paternal allele 2
description: One of a set of sequence features known to exist at a particular genomic location. (GENO:0000879, GENO:0000512 )

name: fatherreaddepth
label: Father Read Depth
description: Father Read Depth (GENO:0000879, NCIT:C155320 )

name: fatherallelefrequencyallele1
label: Father Allele Frequency Allele 1
description: Father Allele Frequency Allele 1 (not the population allele frequency, but the ratio between allele 1 and 2) (GENO:0000879, NCIT:C173545 )

name: fatherallelefrequencyallele2
label: Father Allele Frequency Allele 2
description: Father Allele Frequency Allele 2 (not the population allele frequency, but the ratio between allele 1 and 2) (GENO:0000879, NCIT:C173545 )

name: fatherallelicdepthallele1
label: Father Allelic Depth Allele 1
description: Father Allelic Depth Allele 1 (GENO:0000879, NCIT:C155320 )

name: fatherallelicdepthallele2
label: Father Allelic Depth Allele 2
description: Father Allelic Depth Allele 2 (GENO:0000879, NCIT:C155320 )

name: alleleorigin
label: Allele origin
description: A quality inhering in an allele that describes its genetic origin (how it came to be part of a cell's genome), i.e. whether it occurred de novo through some spontaneous mutation event, or was inherited from a parent. (GENO:0000877 )
